name: Miracle
description:
In this game you have to collect diamonds and various bonuses, beat all enemies, And at the end overcome the Boss of DEMIGOD.You are waited by 9 levels and pleasant graphics.

You are waited by 9 unforgettable levels

  • Pleasant graphics
  • There is a HARDCORE so try not to die
  • Forward to new adventures
  • Shurikens and Swords to defeat enemies
  • Beautiful soundtrack
  • Good luck!
